entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Greater Sudbury
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:00 a.m. EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -0.3Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Sudbury Airport 5:00 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -0.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 2 km
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -1.2°C
Wind: E 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then cloudy. Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets beginning after midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets ending late in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Local blowing snow. Snow and ice pellet amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clear. Local blowing snow early in the evening. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 in the evening then becoming light near midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
